achievements.name: Set a Fire in Your Heart
achievements.description: Complete the main campaign.

achievements.name: Bare Your Fangs
achievements.description: Complete the main campaign on Normal difficulty.

achievements.name: Fight Hard, Die Well
achievements.description: Complete all main campaign missions on Heroic difficulty.

achievements.name: Headmaster
achievements.description: Complete all main missions on Legendary with all Skulls active.

achievements.name: Evasive Maneuvers
achievements.description: Unlock the Thruster ability.

achievements.name: Grab Some Cover
achievements.description: Unlock the Drop Wall ability.

achievements.name: Visionary
achievements.description: Unlock the Threat Sensor ability.

achievements.name: Thrusters On Full
achievements.description: Fully upgrade the Thruster ability.

achievements.name: Impervious
achievements.description: Fully upgrade the Drop Wall ability.

achievements.name: Big Brother
achievements.description: Fully upgrade the Threat Sensor ability.

achievements.name: Outpost Discovery
achievements.description: Complete a Banished outpost.

achievements.name: Bunker Buster
achievements.description: Complete all seven Banished outposts.

achievements.name: Reclaimer
achievements.description: Capture your first Forward Operating Base.

achievements.name: Resurgency
achievements.description: Capture all available Forward Operating Bases.

achievements.name: Who is Max Valor?
achievements.description: Complete all Valor-awarding activities.

achievements.name: We're On Our Way
achievements.description: Answer a UNSC distress call.

achievements.name: No One Left Behind
achievements.description: Answer all UNSC distress calls.

achievements.name: Headhunter
achievements.description: Eliminate a Banished High-Value Target.

achievements.name: Bloodstars' Bane
achievements.description: Eliminate all 15 Banished High-Value Targets.

achievements.name: Dispatches From the Front
achievements.description: Access your first UNSC Audio Log.

achievements.name: Canon Collector
achievements.description: Unlock all UNSC Audio Logs.

achievements.name: Two Sides to Every Story
achievements.description: Access your first Banished Audio Log.

achievements.name: Know Your Enemy
achievements.description: Unlock all Banished Audio Logs.

achievements.name: Infinity Down
achievements.description: Access your first Spartan Audio Log.

achievements.name: Rubicon Protocol
achievements.description: Unlock all Spartan Audio Logs.

achievements.name: Hidden Experience
achievements.description: Locate and secure a Spartan Core.

achievements.name: Mjolnir Master
achievements.description: Acquire all Spartan Cores.

achievements.name: Getting Defensive
achievements.description: Fully upgrade your Energy Shields.

achievements.name: Reaching Out
achievements.description: Fully upgrade the Grappleshot.

achievements.name: Money in the Bank
achievements.description: Access your first Mjolnir Armor Locker.

achievements.name: Armory Amore
achievements.description: Access all 34 Mjolnir Armor Lockers.

achievements.name: Eld Aficionado
achievements.description: Scan a Forerunner Artifact.

achievements.name: Haruspis
achievements.description: Scan all seven Forerunner Artifacts.

achievements.name: Headstrong
achievements.description: Discover your first hidden Skull.

achievements.name: Catacomb
achievements.description: Discover all hidden Skulls.

achievements.name: Please Shut Up
achievements.description: Take out a Banished Propaganda Tower.

achievements.name: Off the Air
achievements.description: Destroy 40 Banished Propaganda Towers.

achievements.name: Gun Runner
achievements.description: Take down all three Banished AA guns.

achievements.name: Forza Veloce
achievements.description: Complete all 14 main missions in under eight hours.

achievements.name: Passing the Gas
achievements.description: Kill a Grunt that's been thrown by a Brute.

achievements.name: Nosebleed
achievements.description: Check out the best possible view.

achievements.name: Those Wonderful Toys
achievements.description: Successfully use the Grappleshot 50 times.

achievements.name: Aegis Fate
achievements.description: Deploy the Drop Wall 50 times.

achievements.name: All-Seeing I
achievements.description: Use the Threat Sensor 50 times.

achievements.name: Run Rabbit, Run
achievements.description: Use the Thruster 50 times.

achievements.name: Whip-Riding the Ghost
achievements.description: Use the Grappleshot to board an enemy Ghost.

achievements.name: Wait, I Can Throw Those?
achievements.description: Throw 50 fusion coils.

achievements.name: Bring Shiela Home Safely
achievements.description: Get the Scorpion all the way to the "House" without it blowing up.

achievements.name: Takes One to Make One
achievements.description: Splatter an enemy with a Ghost.

achievements.name: Wars with Friends
achievements.description: Bring some rescued UNSC Marines along for the ride into a main mission.

achievements.name: Wanna Have a Catch?
achievements.description: Stick 50 enemies with grenades.

achievements.name: A True Test of Legends
achievements.description: Complete all main campaign missions on Legendary difficulty.

achievements.name: Which One of Us is the Machine?
achievements.description: Get and equip a new AI.

achievements.name: Passion for Fashion
achievements.description: Wear a new armor customization item.

achievements.name: "Need a Weapon?"
achievements.description: Try out a new weapon customization item.

achievements.name: That Thing on the Left is the Brake
achievements.description: Test drive a new vehicle customization.

achievements.name: Reporting for Duty
achievements.description: Change your Spartan Tag.

achievements.name: I'm Ready, How 'Bout You?
achievements.description: Change your Spartan's look in the Customize menu.

achievements.name: Humble Beginnings
achievements.description: Complete one level in a Battle Pass.

achievements.name: Battle Tested
achievements.description: Complete a Battle Pass.

achievements.name: Clocking In
achievements.description: Complete a Daily Challenge.

achievements.name: We Have a Job For You
achievements.description: Complete a Weekly Challenge.

achievements.name: Limited Addition
achievements.description: Complete a Limited Time Challenge.

achievements.name: You're Up, Rook'
achievements.description: Play a Ranked Match.

achievements.name: All About the Grind
achievements.description: Finished Ranked Placement Matches.

achievements.name: Get the Popcorn
achievements.description: View a clip in theater.

achievements.name: Customary
achievements.description: Play a custom game.

achievements.name: Getting Strong Now
achievements.description: Launch into Training Mode for the first time.

achievements.name: Sparring Partners
achievements.description: Change any training mode option.

achievements.name: Sharpshooter
achievements.description: Complete a Weapon Drill.

achievements.name: Deadeye
achievements.description: Earn 3 stars in a Weapon Drill.

achievements.name: Augmented
achievements.description: Earn 3 stars in 5 Tier 3 Weapon Drills.

achievements.name: Doing Your Part
achievements.description: Complete the Tutorial.

achievements.name: Just the Two of Us
achievements.description: Access your Personal AI.

achievements.name: Make a Little More Noise
achievements.description: Grab a power weapon from the Tutorial armory.

achievements.name: Peak Performance
achievements.description: Earn 2,000 score in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Slaying with Style
achievements.description: Earn a Mythic Medal in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Back to the Chopper
achievements.description: Earn "Splatter" with a Brute Chopper in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: New Kid on the Block
achievements.description: Earn "Perfect" with a VK78 Commando in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Party Bus
achievements.description: Earn "Mount Up" in a Razorback in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Watt Say You?
achievements.description: Earn "Chain Reaction" with a Shock Rifle in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Peeker's Disadvantage
achievements.description: "Back Smack" an enemy who is zoomed in with a scoped weapon in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Brutality
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with melee using a bladed weapon in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Sick Burn
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with the Ravager's charged shot in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Kebab
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy vehicle with the Skewer in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Skyhook Shot
achievements.description: "Grapplejack" an enemy flying vehicle in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Working Remote
achievements.description: Pick up a weapon using the Grappleshot in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Secret Stash
achievements.description: Place an item in the Razorback's storage in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Bomb Returned
achievements.description: Repel an enemy grenade with the Repulsor in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Do You Even Gift?
achievements.description: Drop a Power Weapon for an ally in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Multi-class Racer
achievements.description: Drive 4 unique vehicles in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: They See Me Rollin'
achievements.description: Spectate an ally that is driving a Warthog or Razorback in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: One Shot, Top Mid
achievements.description: Mark an enemy located at "Top Mid" in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Enemies Everywhere!
achievements.description: Mark 3+ enemies at once in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: Natural Formation Location Sensation
achievements.description: Gain access to a loot cave in a matchmade game.

achievements.name: A Fellow of Infinite Jest
achievements.description: Kill three enemies with the ball in a matchmade Oddball game.

achievements.name: Running Laps
achievements.description: Capture the flag twice in a matchmade Capture the Flag game.

achievements.name: Zone Ranger
achievements.description: Secure 5 zones in a matchmade Strongholds game.

achievements.name: MEDIC!
achievements.description: Revive 3 allies in an Attrition/Elimination round in a matchmade or custom game.

achievements.name: Control Freak
achievements.description: Assist in capturing all zones that lead to a score in a matchmade Total Control game.

achievements.name: Straight to the Bank
achievements.description: Deposit 5 Power Seeds in a matchmade Stockpile game.

achievements.name: Mix Things Up
achievements.description: Get at least one kill with every available weapon and grenade on the Banished ship.

achievements.name: Stick Around
achievements.description: Defeat Tremonius with the Skewer.

achievements.name: Rapid Unscheduled Disassembly
achievements.description: Destroy both Phantoms before they leave Outpost Tremonius.

achievements.name: Out with a Bang
achievements.description: Kill the Tower commander with a Plasma grenade.

achievements.name: Workplace Safety Violation
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with the Banished mining laser.

achievements.name: Conservation of Momentum
achievements.description: Complete the Conservatory in less than 15 minutes.

achievements.name: It Really Does Beat Everything
achievements.description: Eliminate all enemies at the South Beacon with a Scorpion Tank.

achievements.name: Vintage Fisticuffs
achievements.description: In the Nexus, kill the Hunter pair with melee final blows.

achievements.name: Spire Stalker
achievements.description: Kill 40 enemies with the Stalker Rifle at the Command Spire.

achievements.name: Turnabout is Fair Play
achievements.description: Kill one Chieftain and use his turret to kill another in the Repository.

achievements.name: More Than He Bargained For
achievements.description: Defeat War Chief Escharum without ever fully losing your shields.

achievements.name: Gatecrasher
achievements.description: Breach the Auditorium in under three minutes.

achievements.name: What's Rightfully Ours
achievements.description: In co-op, capture all Forward Operating Bases on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Wardens of Zeta
achievements.description: In co-op, complete all seven Banished outposts on any difficulty.

achievements.name: First Responders
achievements.description: In co-op, answer all UNSC distress calls on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Hunting Party
achievements.description: In co-op, eliminate all Banished High-Value Targets on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Air Raid
achievements.description: In co-op, kill 100 enemies while all players are riding air vehicles.

achievements.name: Cow Catcher
achievements.description: In co-op, splatter 50 enemies while riding in a vehicle with another player.

achievements.name: Gruesome Twosome
achievements.description: In co-op, kill 50 enemies while riding a Mongoose with another player.

achievements.name: Keep It Steady
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies with a Sniper Rifle from a vehicle. All players aboard vehicle share progress.

achievements.name: Rolling Thunder
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies with a Gravity Hammer from a vehicle. All players aboard vehicle share progress.

achievements.name: Inseparable
achievements.description: In co-op, kill a Hunter and its bond brother within three seconds of each other.

achievements.name: You, Me, Same Page
achievements.description: In co-op, destroy all cooling towers at the Dig Site within 60 seconds of each other.

achievements.name: Controlled Demolition
achievements.description: In co-op, destroy four Fuel Silos within five seconds at either Ransom Keep or the Forge of Teash.

achievements.name: Wolves at the Doors
achievements.description: In co-op, lower all three gates within 15 seconds of each other at Riven Gate.
